title: Microstructure and physical properties of black-aluminum antireflective films
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15220-15231
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00396A, Paper
Open Access

Cinthia Antunes Corrêa, Joris More-Chevalier, Petr Hruška, Morgane Poupon, Michal Novotný, Peter Minárik, Pavel Hubík, František Lukáč, Ladislav Fekete, Dejan Prokop, Jan Hanuš, Jan Valenta, Přemysl Fitl, Ján Lančok
The microstructure and physical properties of reflective and black aluminum were compared for layers of different thicknesses deposited by magnetron sputtering on fused silica substrates.
